attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As trees are now so precious and essential to help the problem of global warming,we are astounded to notice the large number of trees being choked and killed by ivy which seems to be thriving. Would it not be possible to make it law for landowners to cut down and kill the offending ivy to save the trees

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action and bot your name. Please resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
